    filter_path="aggregations",
    aggs={
        "ip": {
            "terms": {
                "field": "ip"
            },
            "aggs": {
                "tm": {
                    "top_metrics": {
                        "metrics": {
                            "field": "m"
                        },
                        "sort": {
                            "s": "desc"
                        },
                        "size": 1
                    }
                },
                "having_tm": {
                    "bucket_selector": {
                        "buckets_path": {

                        },
                        "script": "params.top_m < 1000"
